tasks.instruction: Upgrade the Event Check-In System for "Pravi Managers" with advanced features: 1. Multi-event support with separate dashboards 2. Real-time stats and charts (registered vs checked-in) 3. Send QR via email on registration 4. Role-based access (organizer, volunteer, participant) 5. Dark mode toggle 6. Export attendance to CSV/Excel 7. Secure QR one-time use only. Maintain core features: registration with QR, check-in by scan/upload, organizer dashboard. Keep UI modern, polished, animated with Pravi Managers branding. Use Shadcn-ui, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS. Keep code efficient, responsive, fast-loading.
